anthropic_config.system: Design a 'Sponsor Hall of Fame' section for my README and Sponsors page that creatively showcases and thanks all contributors at different tiers.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Design a 'Sponsor Hall of Fame' section for my README and Sponsors page that creatively showcases an...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
